channel.title: Custom stat sigs...please help!
channel.description:
hi everyone!
ok...here is my delema. i am trying to create custom stat signatures to be used by the members of the clan i belong to. while i am not the best with code, i do have some experience with the basics. mainly java and html.
i have found several scripts that [u]should[/u] get the job done (most of them thanks to this site!) but i am lost on what i am supposed to do with them now. some are in php and some are in javascript. i have tried saving them into the proper file type and uploading them...only to be cursed with a slew of errors. i think my biggest issue right now is that i am very unfamiliar with php and many of the codes i have gotten need "tweeking" that i am not able to figure out. :confused:
so if possible...can someone give me a step by step guide on how to make it actually work?
any help would be much appreciated!! ;)

item.title: Custom stat sigs...please help!
item.dc:creator: @starshine starshine
item.description:
@starshine wrote:

thanks!!!

i will go check that out and see if i can figure it out.

Read full topic
